characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: Ultimate Spider-Man Volume #6: Venom

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: SPIDER-MANS ULTIMATE VILLAIN GETS THE ULTIMATE TREATMENT.

characters.name: Narrator2
characters.description: The bite of a genetically altered spider granted high-school student Parker incredible, arachnid-like powers: strength, agility, a sixth sense and the ability to walk on walls. Now a fledgling superhero, Peter tries to balance a full high-school curriculum, a night job as a designer, and swing time as the misunderstood, web-swinging Spider-Man. After reuniting with childhood friend Eddie, he discovers a secret: his father's black liquid that can transform into a protoplasmic body suit, curing any illness and enhancing the wearer's strength. When Peter tries to continue his father's work, he accidentally gets encased in the murky substance and is rendered nearly unstoppable... at a terrible price. Collecting Ultimate Spider-Man #33-39, written by Brian Michael Bendis (Daredevil) and illustrated by Mark Bagley (Amazing Spider-Man).

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: Ultimate Spider-Man issue #33

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: Origins

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: She dumped me

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: I can't believe I screwed this up too. I have officialy screwed up every single part of my life on every conceivable level. I am screwing up at school. Im screwing up at home. I failed Harry. I failed Uncle Ben. The entire world hates me because some idiot was running robbing banks dressed as me.

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: And now the one person in the entire world who knows me-- who really KNOWS me-- doesnt want anything to do with me. And the killer thing is-- everything MJ said about me is right! I should have called her, 'you're right!! you're right MJ!! Just come back and we'll work it out!!'  And instead, I let her walk away.

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: I should call her! I gotta hear her voice!

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: Maybe if she hears my voice she'll remember she loves me and she'll snap out of this. That's all I have to do-- I'll-- --no, I'll just-- --I'll cal to make sure she's okay! But hang up real quick and--

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: --no! She'll star 69 me like she did Kong that time.

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: Aggh!! This sucks!!

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description: SMASSKK

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: Oh-- oh, no. Oh, no. Broke my phone, Idiot. Now I'm a big, fat loser with no phone.

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: What-- what if she tries to call me? Now I-- aaagghh! She's not going to call me-- she hates me. Stupid!

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: Dad...

characters.name: Gwen
characters.description: Oh my God!! Aunt May that's hilarious!!

characters.name: Aunt May
characters.description: And listen-- before I know it-- I am up on the scaffolding and I'm screaming at the top of my lungs: 'Jimi Hendrix, will you marry me??' and Jimi points his guitar right at me and--

characters.name: Aunt May
characters.description: --Oh, hi, Peter! We're making cookies. You want to--

characters.name: Peter
characters.description: I'm okay. Thanks.

characters.name: Aunt May
characters.description: Peter?

characters.name: Gwen
characters.description: Jeez. Back break up.

characters.name: Aunt May
characters.description: They'll work it out, Gwen. Mary Jane and he are two peas in a--

characters.name: Gwen
characters.description: The buzz at school is that it was historic.

characters.name: Aunt May
characters.description: I should say something to him.

characters.name: Gwen
characters.description: Like what?
